title: How to Make a Crab Melt Sandwich

steps.headline: Prepare the bread.
steps.description: Spread butter on each slice and lay a slice of cheese on the unbuttered side.

steps.headline: Make the crab mixture.
steps.description: In a medium bowl, mix the crab meat, mayonnaise, green onions, and pepper sauce.

steps.headline: Add an even layer of the crab mixture on the top of one cheese slice.
steps.description: Place the other bread layer on top of the the mixture, with the buttered bread side on the outside.

steps.headline: Grill the sandwich.
steps.description: A lot like a traditional grilled cheese sandwich, in a non-stick pan, brown each side for a few minutes or until the cheese melts.

text: Prepare the bread. Spread butter on each slice and lay a slice of cheese on the unbuttered side. Make the crab mixture. In a medium bowl, mix the crab meat, mayonnaise, green onions, and pepper sauce. Add an even layer of the crab mixture on the top of one cheese slice. Place the other bread layer on top of the the mixture, with the buttered bread side on the outside. Grill the sandwich. A lot like a traditional grilled cheese sandwich, in a non-stick pan, brown each side for a few minutes or until the cheese melts. Finished.
